name: Prosopopoeia
description:
It IS free to download and play, just click, "No thanks, just take me to the download."

Prosopopoeia is a puzzle adventure game where you need to get to each consecutive stage of grief. Enjoy.

WASD + Shift (Run) to move.

Left click to interact.

There is a tutorial in game.

There is an installer, and just a zip folder. Pick which option you feel more comfortable with. Options only for Windows, sorry.

Cheers,

              Alex
